item.title: Using fzf with Azure AAD Login to SSH interactively to Azure VMs with fzf
item.description: AAD Login or EntraID login now, is a feature that allows you to login to Azure VMs using your Entra ID account. It requires that you have the Virtual Machine Login or Virtual Machine Administrator Login roles (the former logs you in as a regular user and the latter an administrator). fzf is a command-line fuzzy finder, as the project site states it is an interactive UNIX filter for command-line that can be used with any list, files, etc.
